metadata.description: A young orphan is chosen by a mysterious light from space to become the latest in a long line of cosmic guardians; super-powered defenders who are charged with protecting the galaxy. Ray Torres is literally teetering on the edge of suicide - planning to leap from the roof of the orphanage where he lives - when a shooting star changes his life forever by choosing him to join a long line of space superheroes called The Cosmic Guard.
metadata.name: Kid Kosmos
